summary:
My name is Diana and I am a banking professional with 8 years of Compliance experience with a special focus on market abuse/misconduct, anti-money laundering, and transaction reporting.  

On a daily basis I ensure that financial Markets business line within Rabobank and the related projects are provided with the necessary expertise on the subjects above. 

I believe in a world where Integrity, Justice and Trust should prevail and where financial institutions have the trust of the taxpayers and operate in an ethical and socially responsible manner. It is my mission to live up to my own values. 

People who know me well describe me as being an honest, unbiased, results oriented and a determined person with developed social skills. I have a sharp eye and am able to articulate my thoughts in a clear and concise manner.
 
I make a great team player because I believe that by making you better I make us all better. 

Diversity and equal opportunities in the corporate world is what I stand for. 

My mother language is Russian, English is close to a native language, and fluent in Dutch. 

Curious to find out more about me? Then don't hesitate to contact me via DM.

education.field_of_study: POLITICAL SCIENCE with a focus on INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS

publications.name: The Soviet Legacy and the Future of Language Politics in Post-Soviet Kazakhstan

profile_positions.description:
- Compliance Officer/Advisor within Compliance Wholesale & Rural Financial Markets Regulations and Advice Department
- providing daily compliance advise to Customer Due Diligence (CDD) (client onboarding) specialists on CDD files 
-  providing expertise knowledge to the following projects: 
FI Care (project aimed at making Customer Due Diligence Policies tailor made for Financial Institutions) 
Transaction reporting wholesale & private banking (EMIR, MiFID PT, MiFID PTT, DFA, MMSR, SMMD)
CSDR
ESG (Sustainable finance)
profile_positions.title: Compliance Advisor Financial Markets

profile_positions.description:
Business Manager within Markets (Dealing room) of Rabobank. Main responsibilities are related to mitigating Compliance risks:

-	a Project Manager responsible for implementing Market Conduct Supervision Framework within Rabobank Financial markets domain globally. The Framework  strengthened the 1st line of defence and mitigated a number of market conduct risks (i.e. front running, hard mark ups, collusion etc.).
-      Conducted risk and control self-assessments with traders and sales persons to identify deficiencies and control gaps.
-	designed a number of 1st line controls within the financial markets department globally
-       set up a new team and designed a new process aimed at cleansing regulatory client data in order to enable Rabobank register as a Swap Dealer with CFTC 
-	Co-designed a new process of performing regulatory data classifications aimed at improving regulatory client data and thereby complying with such regulations as DFA, EMIR, HKMA, MAS, ASIC, and MiFID II.
-       secretary to high level management meetings
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
-coordinating and steering a group of junior analysts in order to complete a large volume of work within tight deadlines
-training and providing guidance in respect of CDD policy and Rabobank procedures to junior team members
-interpreting Rabobak CDD policy into practice and making sure everyone is on the same page
-performing Quality Check on CDD files when necessary
- performing CDD and identifying risk that a client might pose to the organization 
-advising Front office on potential risks of new and existing customers
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Due Diligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
-Before the corporate clients are on-boarded  as clients and can receive financial products offered by the bank, I perform Customer Due Diligence and Know Your Client on the client to ensure the bank's reputation does not suffer from a specific relation. 
-My first and utmost responsibility is to ensure that the clients we are offering our products to are not engaging in any fraud, corruption, money laundering, financing of terrorism or any other activity that may increase the bank's integrity and/or operational risk. 
-I am on the team of the first line defense of the bank's reputation. I gather, collect and analyze data, which relevant internal parties to make a correct decision about a certain client or transaction. 
-On a daily basis I use my communication, analytical, foreign language, advisory and negotiation skills. 
-It also requires a strong sense of responsibility as my position is of high importance to operations of the bank.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Customer Due Diligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Know Your Client and AML (Anti-Money Laundering); 
Client and Relationship Due Diligence and Risk Assessment Analyst: 
Tasks include: 
performing and reviewing client/relationship Due Diligence, which consists of the following steps: 
-perform research on shareholders structure, directors, business activities. Companies that we research include all types of small and large international corporations in all possible countries in the world, requiring knowledge of multiple languages. 
- analyze the content of the data and documents
- perform screening on the companies and natural people found during the research
- prepare case analysis for the Lead and Managing Analyst 
- Discuss and explain the outcome of individual cases and interact with client Relationship Bankers and client AML-officers 
- Work closely with with the Lead and Managing Analyst and give input to drive, control and prioritize various analyses;
- Understand the regulations and procedures of the client processes, defined compliance rules, KYCnet guidelines and remain informed about the updates
profile_positions.title: Customer Due Diligence Analyst
